text: sihamte laksya nakarae neki ye, niscaya allaha, yijane akasasamuha arau prthirai srsti karaiche te'om sihamtara anuraupa srsti karaibalai ksamatabana? Arau teraemi sihamtara babe sthira karaiche eta nirdista kala, yaâ€™ta kono sandeha na'i, kintu yalimasakala kupharai nakarai ksenta horaa na'i
